text: We Were Wolves is a 2014 Canadian feature film directed by Jordan Canning, co- written by Jordan Canning and Steve Cochrane, and starring Peter Mooney and Steve Cochrane as estranged brothers dealing with the fallout of their father's death. The film also stars Lynda Boyd, Dan Beirne and Melanie Scrofano. The film premiered at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival and is distributed by Video Services Corp. == References == == External links == * * We Were Wolves official site Category:2014 films Category:Canadian drama films Category:Canadian films Category:Films shot in Newfoundland and Labrador
title: We Were Wolves
